body.p: “[$FriendName$],” you say, “come over here and stand on this platform.”
“Um, I have a feeling it might help us escape,” you say.
He hesitates for a moment, and then steps onto the platform. The door slides open. Immediately, you dash toward the door, with just one backward glance to see [$FriendName$]’s startled face.
As soon as you’re out, the door slides shut behind you. You are in a clearing in the woods. Behind you, there’s a solid rock face – you can’t even tell where the door used to be.

You reach into your pocket and pull out the diamond. It is heavy in your hand and sparkles brilliantly in the light. Not only are you free… you’re rich! Sunlight has never felt so good on your face. Fresh air has never smelled so wonderful. You head off into the forest, hoping to find a way home.
